DOC.brief_title: Comparing Endoglide Endoserter DSAEK Graft Insertion
DOC.detailed_description: Descemet 's stripping automate endothelial keratoplasty ( DSAEK ) widely perform method corneal transplantation . It consider standard care treatment endothelial cell dysfunction . The advantage technique include faster visual rehabilitation , decrease risk allograft rejection , preservation corneal tectonic strength , stable refraction , reduce irregular astigmatism , less suture complication . The standard care Toronto Western Hospital Dr. Rootman 's Dr. Slomovic 's patient corneal endothelial disease perform DSAEK surgery Tan Endoglide insertion donor graft . Other surgeon Toronto Western Hospital use either Busin glide specifically design forceps insertion donor graft part standard care . Still others advocate use suture pull-through technique . There significant disagreement literature regard DSAEK insertion technique best preserve donor endothelium . Some investigator report good result forceps suture , others caution fold . The less traumatic insertion endothelium , good long term survival corneal transplant . In addition , surgeon also debate whether large- small-incision DSAEK good graft 's long-term viability , propensity postoperative dislocation , ease insertion OR . The propose advantage Tan EndoGlide include consistent reliable delivery corneal donor small incision minimal endothelial loss . The advantage small-incision DSAEK , provide stable wound postoperatively , sutureless surgery , speed , convenience combine procedure standard phacoemulsification . Balancing attractiveness small-incision DSAEK concern endothelial injury donor fold forceps compression , Endosaver ( Ocular Systems , Inc. , Winston-Salem , NC ) novel DSAEK injector device , recently introduce . It allow surgeon insert unfolded tissue without forceps 4-mm clear corneal incision . Both device approve use Health Canada Class 1 device ( http : //www.angioedupro.com/Sharpoint/index.php ? seek=394 ) . Recently , result randomise prospective study conduct Dr. D. Tan ( inventor Tan EndoGlide ) publish . In study effect endothelial cell count use Tan EndoGlide evaluate . The investigator report 15.6 % endothelial cell loss 12 month DSAEK surgery . There publish study regard Endosaver injector , nevertheless , preliminary result indicate poor outcome ( 30 % cell loss one month ) . No study compare two device regard endothelial cell loss report far . The purpose study compare Tan EndoGlide new Endosaver injector term damage donor corneal endothelium compare endothelial cell loss 1 month , 3 month , 6 month , 1 year postoperatively . Our study would involve prospectively examine total 42 subject ( 21 eye Tan EndoGlide 21 eye Endosaver injector ) compare endothelial cell loss visual outcomes group .
